title: Playing ranked pre season and after reset
body:
If I play ranked in preseason, then the reset happens, but I don't play after, will i still have to play every 28 days to stop decay or can I wait until later in the season to play my 10 placement games and while im waiting I wont have to play to stop decay?

If that makes sense?

Thanks

replies.body:
you dont need to do your placements until you are ready. the reset MMR is locked in for game 1 of your placements. nothing decays until you are placed which is after game 10.

there were many people who didnt do placements till the last 2 weeks of season 4, and they got the exact rank they would have gotten if they did it in the first 2 weeks of season 4.

not to mention there is no decay for people below gold 1. so unless you are in plat, never worry about decay from not playing.
I believe if you want to keep the rank you're at now, you will need to play your placement games soon after the release of S5.
